info.title: Transaction Metadata API
info.description: Provides the access and availability to the transaction metadata API.

400.description: Returned when the request body is malformatted or does not match the expected request.

401.description: Returned when the request does not contains the user's credentials.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to access the resource.

404.description: Returned when the resource is not found.

500.description: Returned when an unexpected error occured on the server side.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: ID is the tag unique identifier.

date.description: Date is the date the tag is created/updated.

comment.description: Comment is the comment metadata made on a transaction.

image.description: Image is the image metadata made on a transaction.

narrative.description: Narrative is the narrative metadata made on a transaction.

tag.description: Tag is the tag metadata made on a transaction.

where_tag.description: WhereTag is the where tag metadata made on a transaction.

comments.description: Comments is the list of comments.

images.description: Images is the list of images.

narratives.description: Narratives is the list of narratives.

tags.description: Tags is the list of tags.

where_tags.description: WhereTags is the list of where tags.

label.description: Label is the label of the image.

date.description: Date is the date the image is created/updated.

narrative.description: Narrative is the content of the narrative.

date.description: Date is the date the tag is created/updated.

comment.description: Comment is the comment metadata made on a transaction.

image.description: Image is the image metadata made on a transaction.

narrative.description: Narrative is the narrative metadata made on a transaction.

tag.description: Tag is the tag metadata made on a transaction.

where_tag.description: WhereTag is the where tag metadata made on a transaction.

provider.description: Provider is the provider of the user.

display_name.description: DisplayName is the user's display name.

location.description: Location is the latitude and longitude information of the tag.

date.description: Date is the date the geo information is created/updated.

latitude.description: The latitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-90.0, +90.0].

longitude.title: The longitude in degrees. It must be in the range [-180.0, +180.0]

typesLocation.description:
Location is An object representing a latitude/longitude pair. This is expressed as a pair
of doubles representing degrees latitude and degrees longitude.
Values must be within normalized ranges.
Refer to https://godoc.org/google.golang.org/genproto/googleapis/type/latlng.

OAuth2.description: Access to transaction metadata resources is restricted to authenticated users. The authentication process follows the Authorization Code flow.
